availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: LaRue County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Stephen Skaggs and Rhoda Skaggs. Married to Matilda Ann Preyer Skaggs in LaRue County, Kentucky, on November 24, 1858. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in LaRue County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 144A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, LaRue County, p. 286.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, LaRue County Marriages, Film 000409559, p. 19.
"Uriah Skaggs (1830-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial 40578513, accessed June 27, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/40578513.
